org.eclipse.wst.xsl.launching
Interface IProcessorInstall

All Known Implementing Classes:
InstallStandin, ProcessorInstall
public interface IProcessorInstall

An instance of an XSLT processor (e.g. Xalan 2.7.0).

Author:
Doug Satchwell
See Also:
IProcessorInstall

          Get the the processor type associated with this install

isContributed

boolean isContributed()
Get whether this install has been contributed via the org.eclipse.wst.xsl.launching.processor extension point.

Returns:
true if contributed via the extension point, otherwise false.

getSupports

java.lang.String getSupports()
Get the list of supported XSLT versions

Returns:
true if this install has a debugger, otherwise false.

supports

boolean supports(java.lang.String xsltVersion)
Get whether this install supports the specified xslt version.

Returns:
true if this install supports the version, otherwise false.

getDebugger

IDebugger getDebugger()
Get the debugger associated with this install

Returns:
the debugger, or null if no debugger has been set
